extendedData.value: When Thassa's Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is your devotion to blue. Put up to one of them on top of your library and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If X is greater than or equal to the number of cards in your library, you win the game. (Each U in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Choose one —
• Look at the top X cards of your library. Put up to two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays twice X.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: "I bring a flood that nothing can withstand."

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to blue is less than five, Thassa isn’t a creature.
At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one other target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
3U: Tap another target creature.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Protean Thaumaturge become a copy of another target creature, except it has this ability.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: "Once you see past the veil we call 'reality,' altering your own shape is elementary."

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: Whenever you draw a card, you may pay 1. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Nadir Kraken and create a 1/1 blue Tentacle creature token.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Lifelink
1, Sacrifice Alseid of Life's Bounty: Target creature or enchantment you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value:
"Dawn-kissed, he nourishes the golden grain."
— Psemilla, Meletian poet

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each B in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to black.)

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an enchantment card.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: A sip of recollection, an ocean of regrets.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

extendedData.name: FlavorText
extendedData.value: Right now, in these first moments of creation, it is simultaneously nothing and everything."

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional G.
4G, Sacrifice Wolfwillow Haven: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Activate this ability only during your turn.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Menace
When Noxious Gearhulk enters the battlefield, you may destroy another target creature. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced. (The types of mana are white, blue, black, red, green, and colorless.)
Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Haste
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to other creatures you control.
RW: Tajic, Legion's Edge gains first strike until end of turn.
